description: Superb sound can be yours – for a superb price - with this Sony® dock for iPod®, iPhone®, and iPad®1. A sleek, streamlined design houses a Bass Reflex Speaker System, that together with MEGA BASS® audio enhancement, produces superb sound quality that music aficionados demand.
title: Sony RDPX200IP 30-Pin iPad/iPhone/iPod Bluetooth Wireless Speaker Dock (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
